item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

How do i make more shops with different Npcs. I figured it had something to do with this in client.java
Example: ( this was one of them in there )

else if (NPCID == 3117) { // armor shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; }

So i tryed changing 3117 to the npc ID but didn’t work. Anyone have any ideas?
